name: Little girl's journey. Chapter 0 "Lost"
description:
Little girl's journey. Chapter 0 "Lost"

"Exploring your gramma's backyard can be fun, but things get serious when you realize we went too far and now animal talk? Also, they are huge, everything is huge now, maybe you got smaller..."

A casual adventure game made with bitsy about a girl that was to find her home again

Eventhough this game was meant for the bitsy jam "Frog" Inspiration  was hit me in the face and made me realize this could be far bigger, so tell me if you like the idea of this becoming a series

I want to thank ayolland for making Borksy from where got the hack that allows the sprite to move both sides and Ruin for making Image-to-bitsy That allowed me not to kill myself trying to make backgrounds.

Also, special thanks to my mom for, as always, testing my games

Thank for playing!

Extra: beautiful fanart work made by Alfacinha follow them on insta -----> @ederpedroso
